ygData.subject: Re: Wizard Spell Components
ygData.msgSnippet: From the most recent EverQuest Manual: Specialization – New Functionality The various Specialization skills will be implemented such that if a spell is cast
ygData.messageBody:
From the most recent EverQuest Manual:

"Specialization � New Functionality
The various Specialization skills will be implemented such that if a spell is
cast in, for example, the abjuration family, the Specialization � Abjuration
skill will be checked (if present) and if successful, will decrease the
amount of mana used to cast the spell. The Specialization skills are as
follows: Specialization � Abjuration, Specialization � Alteration,
Specialization � Conjuration, Specialization � Divination, and Specialization
� Evocation."

-Vorteks, High Elf Magician of Burtoxxulous
